abstract: The long-expected arrival of the iPhone on Verizon will end years of exclusivity for AT&T and is likely to upend the smartphone market in the United States.
snippet: The long-expected arrival of the iPhone on Verizon will end years of exclusivity for AT&T and is likely to upend the smartphone market in the United States.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Verizon Wireless plans to announce on Tuesday that it will soon begin selling Apple’s iPhone 4, according to a person with direct knowledge of the plans.

headline.main: Verizon Is Said to Be Planning to Announce iPhone 4 on Its Network
headline.print_headline: Verizon Is Said to Be Planning to Announce iPhone 4 on Its Network
